reviewTextParts/Disliked: Minusem są animacje przygotowywane jedynie dla turystów z Francji, quiz z nagrodami prowadzony po francusku całkowicie wykluczył gości anglojęzycznych. Co do samych animacji trwały krótko typu 7 min stretching, brakowało muzyki przy basenie oraz wieczornych zabaw. W planie było pool party, które się nie odbyło. Cały wyjazd trwał 9 nocy z czego ani razu nie był przygotowany wieczorny występ na scenie czy po prostu puszczona muzyka, aby przyjemniej pic drinka przy barze.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Piękny hotel, piękna okolica, personel bardzo uprzejmy i pomocny. Jedynym minusem są animacje przygotowywane jedynie dla turystów z Francji, quiz z nagrodami prowadzony po francusku całkowicie wykluczył gości anglojęzycznych. Jedzenie wyśmienite, różnorodne, obsługa dbała aby zawsze było wszystko dołożone na czas. Posiłki były zbierane dużo później niż w planie, aby spóźnialscy goście również mieli okazje zjeść posiłek :) Nie da się być głodny w tym hotelu. Pokoje codziennie były sprzątane, dostarczana była butelka wody,  soki w kartoniku oraz czyste ręczniki.

Not all rooms are comfortable for a longer period stay. Our first assigned room (with great sea view) was outdated and very close to (noisy) restaurant, bathroom too small for a couple.

reviewTextParts/Liked:
Definitely a holiday we will remember with affection! The structure is wonderful and clean, the staff always helpful and friendly and what about the food? Fabulous!!! Despite the large number of guests, the food was always of high quality, selected, always different and for all tastes. Usually buffets create confusion and rush, but this is definitely not the case. The same applies to the services in general. The animation team spoke mainly in French, but although it was not our language, we were involved and participated in every activity.
In other words, every day was always a pleasant surprise!
An experience to be repeated and recounted.
Thanks to all the wonderful people who made this holiday memorable!
roomInfo: Family Suite

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Alcohol - all inclusive alcoholic cocktails are from the machine. No taste. Table wine is not bad though.
For the menu cocktails, you need to pay extra but even those ones are not very good.
No music at any pool...
reviewTextParts/Liked:
Food - good variety of food and very tasty. It is impossible not to find something you like.
Room - spacious, comfortable and with an amazing view.
Staff - reception staff are very helpful. Big thanks to Tony. He gave us a free room upgrade and booked for us dinner in the a la carte restaurant. Over there you ll be delighted by Maria's customer service. She is a star.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: We had to change our room because the first room they gave us was very dirty and full of insects and spiders. It took us going to the reception 4-5 times util they changed our room. The staff in the reception could be nicer and more helpful.The spa was poor.The activities around the swimming pool were really loud.
reviewTextParts/Liked: The views were amazing. swimming pools were very nice. Good quality and variety of foods in the buffet.
reviewTitle: Beautiful resort but the service needs to improve
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The food was not at quality at all. Though we requested a burger and they accommodated my request but still it was not tasty. Drinks also of not that quality if you want better you have to pay. Drinks at the beach bar are not included - not sure why! There should be also more activities for kids as the resort is mainly for families traveling with kids.
reviewTextParts/Liked: They provided a bigger room overlooking the sea despite we booked for the mountain view. The beach was amazing and night show was good
reviewTitle: Great as with sea view and a good swim. Food is not great at all and it can get cery busy
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
The location was a plus and minus. Great for its isolation but also not much else to do but resort activities.
The staff seemed clueless on many questions. The tour we signed up for we probably wouldn't have if we had better info. Waste of our day and money for our preferences.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Everything! This family vacation felt like a family camp experience!  Everything was taken care of for us with our all inclusive dining option. The food was great. The entertainment was fun and engaging. My whole family enjoyed the animation team and learning the dance.  The kids disco was so fun each night. 100% great trip!
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: nothing
reviewTextParts/Liked: Everything was great. The staff was very very helpful and nice
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Really lovely hotel but don’t spend your whole trip here as there is so much to explore in Crete
reviewTextParts/Liked: Great pools
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Loved everything
reviewTextParts/Liked: Clean, beautiful scenery, staff were so so helpful and dedicated
reviewTitle: It was really amazing, wish I could stay longer
roomInfo: Family Suite

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Del resort tutto bene peccato per l'animazione francese che parla solo francese e fa cose solo per francesi.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Ovviamente all inclusive. Cibo ottimo con varietà. Stanze pulite. Personale reception gentile ed accogliente.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Salle de bains voir ci-dessus
reviewTextParts/Liked:
Structure extérieure formidable, piscines et ponton en bord de mer géniaux.
Chambre correcte avec bon matelas
Très peu de chaînes à la télévision.
Salle de bain vieillot et peu fonctionnelle : pas d’eau froide, lavabo minuscule, pommeau qui glisse sur la tige lors mode douche, quantité d’eau minuscule lors chasse d’eau, dommage pour une chambre double supérieure
Un bon séjour dans l’ensemble
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
La salle de bain : pour un hôtel 4 étoiles,  c'est lamentable : pas de meuble pour poser les affaires , juste un tabouret en plastique 1er prix .
Pas d'etendoir pour sécher les maillots de bains .
Au niveau de la salle de restauration : pas de décoration,  salle toute blanche avec des tables et chaises noires 1er prix aussi , pas de climatisation , ni de ventilateurs . A la fin du repas , on dégouline de sueurs !
Ce n'est que des petits détails,  mais si le directeur de cet établissement se met à la place d' un client il comprendrait et cela permettait à son établissement d' avoir plus d' avis positifs
reviewTextParts/Liked:
La situation de l' hotel
Les chambres sont faîtes tous les jours
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Il n’y a malheureusement pas une bonne insonorisation dans les chambres.. réveil le matin dès 6h par le personnel de l’hôtel ou par les voyageurs qui repartent.
Manque de transats en plein mois de juillet, ce qui provoque quelques petites disputes entre certains clients.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
La vue de l’hôtel, le petit déjeuner, les différents bars de l’hôtel.
La nourriture de l’hôtel est très bien pour un all inclusive.
Plusieurs piscines très agréables avec superbes vues sur la mer.
reviewTitle: Très belle hôtel avec vue magnifique !
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
-Les animations pas assez bien desservies, pas de matériel adéquat, l'organisation à améliorer
-La piscine Principale pas pratique, un tout petit endroit où l'on a pied
-pas bien desservi pour se déplacer facilement vers d'autres endroits
reviewTextParts/Liked:
-la cuisine
-l'emplacement, la vue
-la chambre propre et belle vue
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Das Essen war leider nicht so lecker, oft hat alles vorallem die Salate sehr fade geschmeckt.
Außerdem gab es keine wirklich schönen Abendprogramme für Erwachsene
reviewTextParts/Liked: Sehr schönes Hotel mit vielen Möglichkeiten etwas zu unternehmen
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
*Wir hatten uns von der Junior Suite mehr erwartet!
- kein Meerblick
- Keine Trennwand von unserem Balkon zu den Nachbarbalkonen
- Die anderen Gäste gingen oft bei unserem Balkon vorbei, da sie den Weg zum Meer nicht fanden.
Fazit: Keine Privatsphäre!
Wir haben dann auf Nachfrage ein Upgrade zum Zimmer mit privaten Pool erhalten! Die Rezeptionistinnen waren da sehr zuvorkommend.
Fazit dieses Zimmers: Auf jedenfall MIT Pool buchen!!!! Die Hoteleigenen Pools sind teilweise sehr überfüllt. So hat man immer die Möglichkeit, sich zurückzuziehen und sich in Ruhe zu sonnen.
* Die öffentlichen WC's lassen sich NICHT zusperren!!! Das war für uns sehr verwirrend. Auf Nachfrage bei der Rezeption sagte man uns, dass das präventiv gemacht wurde, weil sich in der Vergangenheit viele Kinder selbst eingesperrt hatten.... Ich finde, diesen Grund könnte man auf den WC-Türen anbringen, damit man nicht denkt, es handelt sich um derart alte oder schon kaputte Türen....
* Die Rezeptionistinnen waren teilweise eher unfreundlich.
-> Bezüglich WC-Türen: Die Dame bei der Rezeption meinte zu mir, man soll einfach am besten zu zweit aufs WC gehen. Doch wie soll mich mein Partner am Damen-WC begleiten?!
Noch dazu habe ich in der Nähe des Restaurants und den dort öffentlichen WC's 'Day use Rooms' entdeckt. Die Rezeptionistin hätte mich darüber auch informieren können!!! Bei diesen Räumen lässt sich alles unproblematisch zusperren. Diese wurden dann von uns genützt. Der Weg vom Restaurant zum Zimmer - nur für einen WC-Besuch - ist dann doch sehr weit.....
-> Der Spa Bereich hatte geschlossen. Darüber wurden wir auch gar nicht informiert. Nur auf Nachfrage, weil wir den Bereich aufgrund der riesen größe des Resorts nicht fanden, wurde ich darüber informiert. Grund: Corona-Bestimmungen. Doch auf der EIngangstür des Spa Bereichs entdeckten wir ein Schild mit der Aufschrift: Wegen Umbauarbeiten geschlossen.
reviewTextParts/Liked: * Das Essen war sehr gut! Es gab abwechslungsreiche Küche (Muscheln, Fisch, Veganes, Vegetarisches, Müsli, Obst + Pasta/Pizza/Pancakes jeden Tag!) Dennoch wurde sehr nachhaltig gekocht - es gab viele Aufläufe, wo die Reste vom Vortag gut verwertet wurden. * Das Meer dort ist glasklar und man kann auch viele Fische beobachten!* Es gibt viele Aktivitäten rund um das Resort: Boote kann man ausleihen (man benötigt keinen Führerschein dafür), es gibt eine Quadsafaritour, man kann Schnochrcheln, SUP, ...)
reviewTitle: Großes Resort mit super Essen & Meer, doch nichts für romantische Zweisamkeit.
roomInfo: Junior Suite with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Rien en particulier, tout était très bien
reviewTextParts/Liked: La proximité de la plageLa qualité et variété de la nourritureTout le personnel aux petits soins La climatisation et propreté des chambresLes chambres vue sur mer sont un vrai plus
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: 1) Нами был забронирован семейный люкс, однако в день заезда нас поселили в бунгало. На следующий день после нашего запроса предложили другой номер, который тоже не устроил. Только с 3-го раза нам предоставили тот номер, на который мы рассчитывали при бронировании.2) Напитки, входящие в all inclusive.3) Слабая анимация.Но все это не помешало отлично отдохнуть в отеле.
reviewTextParts/Liked: 1) Великолепное чистое море.2) Красивые виды из отеля.3) Приветливый персонал.4) Вкусное и разнообразное питание (кроме напитков).5) Светлые и чистые номера.
reviewTitle: В целом проживание в отеле понравилось!
roomInfo: Family Suite

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Leider ist All-Inclusive nicht bei jeder Bar das Gleiche. Es wird Zimmerservice angeboten aber ein Telefon fehlt. Das Personal achtet leider nicht zu 100% auf die Schutzmassnahmen, obwohl da eher die Gäste mitschuldig sind…
reviewTextParts/Liked: Das Personal ist sehr nett aber spricht eher nur English oder vor allem auch Französisch. Das Zimmer war gross und sauber und die Aussicht war wunderschön.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Calitatea mâncări nu era de 4 stele
reviewTextParts/Liked: Locatia este intro zona linistita cu personal foarte draguti camere renovate,
roomInfo: Junior Suite with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Plats vraiment salés ! L’emplacement est plutôt à l’écart des activités touristiques comme les belles plages …..
reviewTextParts/Liked: Tout d’abord, l’hôtel en lui même sa splendeur , le personnel incroyablement gentil ! Une facilité d’accès aux plages ! Un buffet sympathique et gourmand ! Une belle chambre avec des femmes de ménages super gentilles et très compétentes ! Super belle vue !
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: L’établissement est plutôt isolé du village d’agia Pelagia.
reviewTextParts/Liked: L’hôtel propose des activités intéressantes ! Nous avions fait du quad safari et je recommande cette activité. Les chambres sont très propres, les lits sont confortables. Côté restauration, le buffet proposé est très variés et on s’est toujours régalé.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Liked: Kedves, vendégszerető kiszolgálás, tisztaság, minden egy helyen megtalálható.
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Liked: Ben situé, nous avons passé une seule nuit. Nous avons eu l’all in à la place du petit dej. Belle vue sur la mer, le coucher de soleil. Un coup de cœur tout spécial pour Jennifer des relations publiques. Personnel souriant et accueillant. Nourriture variée.. pour ceux qui aiment les hôtels « all in ».
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

propertyResponse: Thank you Mr Oren! We really appreciate you kind words and we hope to see you again for a fourth visit! 😁 Best regards!
reviewTextParts/Liked: פעם שלישית שלנו במלון, פשוט מדהים, המיקום, הנופים החופים וכמובן המלון עצמו , רמת הניקיון והאוכל , מקווים לחזור בפעם הרביעית בקרוב, בונוס מלון ללא ישראלים כלל

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Napoje podawane w Allinclusive są paskudne, alkohole też bardzo niskiej jakości, szkoda bo to jedyny minus
reviewTextParts/Liked: Lokalizacja i przepiękne widoki z budynku i pokojów - to główny atut hotelu, dostęp do różnych plaż i możliwość nurkowania. Hotel po remoncie i większość pokoi ma nowe wyposażenie. Obsługa i czystość na najwyższym poziomie.
roomInfo: Family Suite

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Man muss bedenken, dass dieses Hotel All-inclusive offeriert und somit vor allem beim Essen extremes Kantinen-Flair herrscht. Obwohl das Essen gut war!
Hauptsächlich Franzosen.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Super Lage, tolle Pools und Strände!

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Jobbigt med alla trappor men också bra med tanke på all god bar och dryck som konsumeras
reviewTextParts/Liked: Omgivningen, oerhört vackert!!

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Le lit collé au mur

Les nombreux escaliers, non recommandé pour les personnes peu mobiles ou enfants avec poussette.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
La vue époustouflante
La restauration très très bonne malgré une salle faisant un peu cantine.
Propreté de la chambre.
Personnel très agréable.
Plate-forme avec accès mer
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: the food didn't make you feel great if ate breakfast, lunch and dinner for two/three days in a row. no bus or train to hotel. taxi only or rent a car. a lot of French and German guests so entertainment in the hotel is geared manly to them
reviewTextParts/Liked: Very Nice Hotel. 3 small beaches within walking distance. Bigger beach only 20minute walk. Quad Biking, Water Sports etc all available to book through hotel. One fresh water swimming pool and one sea water..both very nice. Wine tasting on a Friday night for free. Gave us 4 free cocktails on arrival.
reviewTitle: very nice stay, more of a family/quiet resort and area but perfect for a quiet beach/pool holiday
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Liked:
Everything were excellent, beautiful beach, wonderful staff, Very big varieties of food at the meals, very friendly and kind staff.
Me and my wife had perfect vacation
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Everything was good!
reviewTextParts/Liked: The location, overlooking the sea from almost all sides, the friendliness of the staff, the yummy food, all super nice!
reviewTitle: Relaxing atmosphere with stunning views, many pools, beaches and corners to chill!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Everything was great!
reviewTextParts/Liked:
The hotel is just stunning. I fall in love with every corner. Stunning sea views from everywhere! We had the all-included package and it was great. The food was delicious, a lot of variety. The staff were very friendly and the room was clean and comfortable. We are looking forward to come back again. I definitely recommend this hotel if you wish to have a relaxing holiday with breathtaking sea views.
Thank you for the great experience!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: nothing. everything was perfect 🤪
reviewTextParts/Liked: buffet and the food was amaazing. Employers who worked there were friendly and heartwarming to talk to. The atmopshere!
reviewTitle: It was paradise on the earth.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
The bars are limited with only 2 bars (that are right next to each other offering the all inclusive drinks) the beach bar was a paid bar making it restrictive on why you’d go down there when you’d have to come back up for a drink!
Also the all inclusive finishes at 11pm even though the bars stay open until 1am- seemed very silly concept!
reviewTextParts/Liked: the property was clean modern and well laid out with great facilities. all inclusive was ok. food was excellent with a brilliant choice at every meal sitting
reviewTitle: great resort with something for everyone albeit access isn’t brilliant in places if you have mobility issues
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Liked: Beautiful place!! we loved the time we stayed there.  It was hard to leave. Calm place.  Helpful staff.  Food in abundance.  Comfortable and spacious room
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: In our floor the acoustic were not that well, so if people walk/talk in the corridor we could hear them loud
reviewTextParts/Liked: Best value for money by a margin, this was one of the best vacations i ever had, the location is beautiful, the rooms are big and nice, the staff is so efficient, the food is great, we didn't want to leave. I highly recommend.
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The all inclusive drinks are not the best quality, but still okay. Some programs were only in french which was disappointing and not so kind.
reviewTextParts/Liked: The staff was very kind and everything was so clean. The pools were nice and clean and sunbeds were always available. The food was delicious and had a big variety every night.
reviewTitle: Good value for money and I would recommend it
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: spa
reviewTextParts/Liked: staff food pool
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Even though we paid for all inclusive, there where still a lot of things not included, like alcohol in the bars, cappuccino with milk from barista - you have to pay (without milk - for free), milkshake , beds on the beaches and so on.  Both beaches are rocky and you need to have shoes to enter the water.
reviewTextParts/Liked: The room was huge, with very nice sea view. The room was very conveniently separated with the wall into two rooms, so my 13 years old son had privacy. Very beautiful beaches near hotel. The food was very good.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: too much stairs if you select beach front. take a while to get to the food area. not a problem for young couples, hard on older couples.
reviewTextParts/Liked: nice views, good not bad, drinks always available.
reviewTitle: I enjoyed the island and the scenery.
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Maybe only the distance from the Heraklion city, but you really don’t want to go out, you have everything in the hotel.
reviewTextParts/Liked: the best resort I’ve been at! there is no reason for my opinion going to the city! you have all you need at the hotel, the food-wow, the receptionist is so nice and helpful, the view is one of a kind. take the room with sea view, you won’t regret it. the distance from airport is 30 min, 45€. we’ll come back for sure.
reviewTitle: You must come there! the best decision you’ll make.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Our room was next to the cleaning cupboard and so we were woken up very early each morning (luckily we do wake up early ish so this could’ve been more of an issue for others). The bar staff were a little unfriendly at the cocktail bar and the lifts were so small (the one to the salt water pool particularly!) but overall absolutely fantastic.
reviewTextParts/Liked: The food was fantastic and they worked really hard at ensuring there was a variety each night. The catering staff were lovely. Really enjoyed our stay. Our room had everything we needed and was very nice and spacious. Absolutely loved the salt water pool.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Really minor things. The coke from the tap was more like water, but who cares? Don't drink coke here. I recommend bringing your own tennis balls if you wanna play tennis, and an electric moschito killer, for relaxed nights. The animation programs were a bit poor in my view.
reviewTextParts/Liked: The hotel, the beaches, the pools, the restaurant, the food variety, the bars were all great, the staff was very friendly and helpful.
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: All-inclusive could have been 24 hours, rather than stopping at 2330.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Staff, food, service, etc. were excellent from the start and throughout the entire stay!
roomInfo: Family Suite

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Everything was really nice overall. One minor suggestion is that the music played a little late at night for some guests (until midnight). Also, I had placed a request online for chocolate and fruit upon arrival but it was not delivered.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Beautiful location, access to beaches, all inclusive option, reasonable price, spa, good customer service.
reviewTitle: This is a beautiful all inclusive seaside resort at a reasonable price for a memorable family vacation. resort

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Cocktails in all inclusive service might be better

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The alcoholic drinks that were served as part of the all-inclusive deal were of poor quality- very weak beer and low quality cocktails.
reviewTextParts/Liked: This is a beautiful location with a great view overlooking the sea. It is a great resort for a sun and sea holiday. The hotel staff are very pleasant and provided a great service throughout. We asked to change from two family suites to 4 double rooms and they did this with no extra charge. The rooms were very clean and the food was very good
reviewTitle: Really enjoyed our stay here! Particularly suitable for couples and families with young children.
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: What we missed a little bit was the possibility of evening-night activities (disco, dancing etc.) for younger people, it was more for older holidayers. When we stayed at the Tsimento beach we missed a little a possibility to drink at the bar as all inclousive guests, but it was not a huge problem.
reviewTextParts/Liked: It was just like in the pictures. We loved our sea view room, the food was delicious with a wide range that we could choose from, the staff was friendly and helpful. We got a bottle of wine as a present from the hotel, it was great.
reviewTitle: we enjoyed it very much, we had great weather, the facilities, beaches and pools were great.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The arrange off the suits with two rooms. It wasn't separated and intimate.
reviewTextParts/Liked: We liked the view, the place, the beach and the swimming pulls.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: It wouls be good to improve on cocktails.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Excellent place to stay, setting, food, rooms.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Other patrons can be a bit wild, but that’s expected for being so close to a large city/airport.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Great location and very clean with nice staff.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Liked:
I went with my 13yo son and all i can say is that we felt amazing! Although the rooms and views were amazing,what made our trip feel like we were home (well better than home😁) were the people working there who are absolutely outstanding! From the first person that greeted us to the last.Traveling with a teenager might be worse than with a toddler 😂 so we absolutely stressed EVERYONE at the reception with a million questions and requests and they were always kind and helpful! A very special thank you to Fotini (i hope i got the name corectly)from front desk,she is a god sent and the resort is lucky to have her! Guests remember how they were treated,and they come back for that feeling,the views and rooms are the same or better in all 4/5 star all inclusive resorts across the globe.
So thank you all for making our stay amazing!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Nothing!
reviewTextParts/Liked: Traveling with kids isn't always easy, but this property has it all for the little ones.  Even as adults we had an enjoyable time.  The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, especially Maria-Christina and Maria-Irini.  Maria-Christina is the perfect example of customer service, she catered to our every need and was always accessible at all times when needed. The rooms were great with an amazing view and the daily housekeeping service was spot on. The food selection at the buffet was very good and the a la carte restaurants were exceptional.
reviewTitle: I highly recommend this property and would definitely stay here again!
roomInfo: Family Suite

reviewTextParts/Liked: surroundings
roomInfo: Family Suite

reviewTextParts/Liked: Perfect client service. Delicious food.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The soft drinks were not very good (sodas). This is for sure to change for a 4+ stars hotel. With an all inclusive package I did not expect to pay to access the "real" cocktails : you can get a standard mojito for free, but you need to pay to get a real one (e.g. with the good ingredients in good quantities). On the same line, it's a bit a pity that the bar a the beach is not included in the all inclusive package.
reviewTextParts/Liked: beautiful view from our view and from many places in the hotel. Food at the main restaurant was very good and offered a wide variety. The staff was very efficient and very pleasant. My teenagers had a very good time during the day (beach, swimming pool, sport activities...) as well as in the evenings (thematic parties).

reviewTextParts/Liked: 5* service! I was in Crete for a conference and had a busy schedule this time round. I have to share this special thank you to all the Peninsula team that helped make it a smooth and enjoyable experience. The concierge was super attentive and planned my transfers to and from Heraklion city. They arranged for my late dinner the night I arrived and also prepared a delicious packed lunch for the next day. An iron was left in my room as I requested and so I even had time to enjoy a relaxing swim in my favourite Cretan waters at Tsimento Beach. I will be back again no doubt. Thanks again!!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: drunk people banging on all the doors at night...smoking on beach / balconyterrible noise from other resort

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Nothing
reviewTextParts/Liked:

roomInfo: Junior Suite with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The hotel is kind of far from everything. To reach civilization you need to walk at least 20 minutes to Agia Pelagia village.Can't complain for the price paid, but food was just average, nothing spectacular.All-inclusive drinks (especially "juices") are very watered, 6 cocktails included in the all-inclusive package (Blood Mary, Skrewdriver, Tequila Sunrise, Gin Fizz, Daiquiri, Cuba Libre) are prepared using these, so the taste is not great (though Gin Fizz was nice). Wine and beer are just standard all-inclusive, nothing special.Due to the lack of ventilation, there was a constant sewer smell in the bathroom.Wifi access in the room was pretty choppy.Animation only in French, though probably half of hotel visitors were speaking German and Russian. The animation itself looked pretty weak, though we usually ignore it anyways.Our room had a nice 50" Smart TV, but it wasn't connected to the internet, so we couldn't stream anything from our phones/tablets to it. I know this super geeky complaint, but with that nice equipment it would be really easy to allow younger visitors like us to use TV in the way people use it in 2021 :-)
reviewTextParts/Liked: Amazing views from the hotel.The hotel itself is pretty modern, good facilities, very nice territory.We got a free room upgrade, that was really nice.It's possible to check out later. If it's not possible to stay in the room for a longer time, then it's possible to use separate room to take a shower after the beach.Very nice platform with direct access to the sea (Tsimento). Free sunbeds and umbrellas there.Towels were changed daily.Wifi access on the sea platform.Bus from Heraklion stops at hotel reception.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The only thing we were not very pleased about were two blonde women that attended us a couple of times at the reception and were a bit rude towards us. We felt they were not very friendly and not very happy for having us there.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
It was the first time my husband and I went on holidays in summer after getting married and spending nearly two years working non-stop, and we were more than pleased with our stay at Peninsula. It exceeded our expectations. We were not expecting the resort to have connections with the villages or Heraklion but there was actually a bus that could take you to the capital of the island in 45 mins for just 3,5€. The building was beautiful and much bigger than we imagined. It had its little beautiful hidden corners and we used the pathways to go for night summer walks.
It was an absolute pleasant stay with the days spent at the beach, on a boat that we rented, and exploring the surroundings of the area. Definitely worth staying in if you want to get to know a little bit of Crete and discover another beautiful part of this planet.
P.S. Hats off to the Pizza Guy for making delicious pizzas every night!!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
ביום הראשון קיבלנו חדר בונגלו בקומת קרקע למרות שלא הזמנו חדר כזה, החדר חשוך ומחניק עם ויטרינה קטנה שצופה לים אך מאוד לא נוח לפתיחה, מה גם שכל מי שעובר שם מסתכל לתוך החדר. היה גם חלון בחדר ילדים שפונה למסדרון שעוברים בו אנשים ולכן לא ניתן היה לפתוח אותו.. כמו כן לא היו בחדר מספיק מתלים, מדפים ושידות..והשיא היה שלא היו מים חמים במקלחת. למזלנו הצוות נענה לבקשתנו לעבור חדר. אך רק למחרת עברנו לחדר מרווח ומואר יותר... עדיין היתה בעיה עם המים החמים בבקרים. כמו כן שהינו בחודש אפריל ועדיין קריר באזור..הטמפרטורה בבריכה הסגורה היתה 22 מעלות..קר מידי לעונה. ארוחת הבוקר מגוונת עם אותו מגוון בכל יום.. קצת נמאס.
בצהרים ובערב היה אוכל מגוון יותר אך לא מאוד טעים ולכן אכלנו גם מחוץ למלון.
reviewTextParts/Liked: המקום יפהפה וצופה לנוף מדהים. יש כל מיני סוגי חדרים. החדרים עם הויטרינה הגדולה לנוף מרווחים ונקיים. לא היה מזיק אם היתה תאורה נוספת בחדר אמבטיה ועוד כמה מתלים למגבות
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
L’absence totale d’insonorisation dans les chambres. Impossible de faire la grasse mat, le personnel de nettoyage se charge de faire l’animation dans les couloirs entre sonneries de téléphone et conversations plutôt bruyantes…
La nourriture en général, toujours tiède et sans intérêt gustatif particulier. Ne vous attendez  pas à autre chose qu’une grande cantine où la quantité prime nettement sur la qualité.
La faiblesse de la qualité des animations. Les soirées et animations proposées tout au long de la semaine ne sont clairement pas à la hauteur d’un resort hôtel. L’equipe d’animation (très restreinte) fait du mieux qu’elle peut, au vu du nombre de vacanciers et du peu de moyen mis à disposition.
L’absence de douche à proximité des piscines…
Enfin, les horaires en général. Tout est trop tôt !
Bref, dans l’ensemble nous  avons passé un séjour agréable (1 semaine suffit amplement) mais on constate malheureusement le manque de moyen de ce resort, au niveau des équipements comme de l’infrastructure.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
La chambre et sa vue mer !
Les piscines
La gentillesse du personnel
reviewTitle: Agréable séjour mais la qualité est à revoir ￼

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Les animations sont vraiment le point faibles de cet établissements. Elles finissent en général tôt, 23h. Et sont en général un peu tristes. La soirée crétoise par contre est vraiment sympathique.
Tout au long de la journée, très peu d’ambiance musicale.
Pas de TPE dans les différents bars de l’hôtel et pas de moyen dématérialisé non plus. Par ailleurs, tout n’est pas accessible partout. Chaque bar a ses spécialités ce qui est dérangeant quand on doit aller de bar en bar pour avoir un petit quelque chose à manger.
reviewTextParts/Liked: La vue sur la mer. Le lobby est vraiment sympas aussi dommage qu’ils soient si loin du reste de l’hôtel.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Grootste tegenvaller: de WiFi. Amper verbinding over de site heen, amper tot niets op de kamer. Voor ons wel een mega afknapper. Aangezien het nooit wijzigt geraak je snel uitgekeken op het ochtendbuffet. All-in is in feite niet helemaal 'all-in'. Als je helemaal tot beneden bent gewandeld om aan de zee te liggen (privé-gedeelte van het hotel), bijvoorbeeld, is het ineens betalend. De eetruimte heeft een prachtig uitzicht maar heeft wel een refter-gevoel én je kan niet buiten eten. De foto's tonen mooie eetruimtes, maar die zijn van de all-a-carte restaurants die overigens niet tegelijk en niet alle dagen geopend zijn. Het kindergedeelte ligt ergens verstopt, ver weg van de andere zwembaden - heel erg jammer. Het badje is niet verwarmd, de speeltuin is klein en niet peutervriendelijk. Desondanks de vele kindjes die we gezien hebben, zat er niemand op deze plek. Airco op de kamer geeft veel licht en geluid af, dan nog liever het raam op kip en af en toe een mug.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Vriendelijk personeel. Het buffet was 's middags en 's avonds heel gevarieerd en uitgebreid voorradig. Het eten en de eetruimte waren ook baby-proof (veel zitjes te vinden). We kregen een ruimere kamer dan we geboekt hadden en genoten zo onverwachts van een aparte slaapkamer voor de baby. Prachtige uitzichten. Géén handdoekleggers! Veel ligplek. Bus naar Heraklion stopt aan de deur. Leuke strandjes in de buurt (horen wel niet bij het hotel).
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

propertyResponse:
Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that your experience at our resort did not meet your expectations. I wish you had informed us about the cockroaches at the time because there are various actions we can take to remedy the situation instantly. A specialist has informed us that these are forest cockroaches, which means they are found in nature. They are endemic to rural areas all over Crete and various other Greek islands. There is always a slight surge towards the end of July, when the weather is very hot and humid. As you know, the hotel is surrounded by nature and your room specifically was located near the gardens. On our end, we do everything possible to contain the situation, we perform monthly exterminations and are very clean as a unit (our cleanliness rating here is a 9). On the off-chance cockroaches enter guest rooms, we are able to perform a local extermination, which works very efficiently. 
Lastly, to avoid misinformation, there are two all-inclusive bars: the Snack Bar and the Pool Bar. These offer a list of all-inclusive drinks. A small buffet with light eats is available throughout the day at the Snack Bar and a small aperitif at the Pool Bar in the early evening. There is also a self-service drinks point by the salt-water pool. The Lobby Bar and Tsimento Beach Bar are indeed not a part of this plan - these offer a different experience with table service etc. but we now provide booking.com guests with complimentary vouchers so that they can experience these bars too. 
Furthermore, regarding the beaches, all the information is clearly indicated on our website. There is access to two public beaches as well as the Tsimento beach platform, which is indeed a concrete platform. 
Please do reach out to us if you would like to discuss further or if there is anything we can do at this stage. Warm regards and apologies once again.

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Le site n’est pas adapté aux petits enfants. Certes, il y a un mini club mais les enfants n’ont pas pied dans les piscines principales. L’hôtel ne possède pas de véritable plage mais une sorte de jetée qui donne accès à la haute mer donc impossible avec des enfants.
Les buffets sont bons, dans l’ensemble, mais extrêmement répétitifs.
Nous avions des massages réservés et à notre arrivée au Spa, celui-ci était fermé pour raisons techniques. Or personne n’a daigné nous en informer ! Le Spa est resté fermé pour 1 semaine ! Difficile à croire en plein mois de juillet quand l’hôtel possède le terme Spa dans son nom.
La propreté laisse à désirer (le nettoyage des chambre n’est pas au top) tout comme l’hygiène des piscines.
Bref, si le cadre fait rêver, le reste ne suit pas pour un hôtel de cette catégorie. C’est bien dommage…

L’équipe d’animation et principalement les animatrices (Maude et Élise qui sont les rayons de soleil du complexe) mettent beaucoup d’énergie pour essayer de mettre une bonne ambiance.

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Нам дали 4-хместный семейный номер, который состоял из 2 комнат. 1 большая кровать стояла в дальней комнате, а 2 другие - в ближней комнате возле двери . Спать в этой комнате было невозможно, т.к. слышимость просто ужасная. Ночью пьяные гости громко общались в коридоре, а с 6 утра персонал очень громко переговаривался и гремел инвентарем. Ощущения не из приятных, поспать ночью не получалось.
Все меропрятия в отеле на французском языке. Чувствовали себя из-за этого крайне некомфортно, т.к. французский не знаем.
Уборщица специально приходила в самое жаркое время, когда мы отдыхали в надежде, что мы откажемся от уборки. Когда попросили прийти чуть позже, она нам отказала. Мыло и шампуни старалась недодать, приходилось просить на респешене.
Зонтиков и лежаков на пляже отеля не хватало. Много было посторонних людей, не являющимися гостями отеля. Они занимали лежаки и зонтики чуть ли не на целый день, за этим никто не следил. Бар на пляже платный, в соимость all inclusive не входит. За напитками нужно бежать долго вверх, что неудобно на жаре.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Месторасположение хорошее, красивые виды, бассейны. Море прекрасное. Ухоженная территория.
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Bungalow with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: „Strand“ gibt es in dem Sinn überhaupt nicht. Betonierter Beton-Liegeplatz. Bei starkem Wellengang fast unmöglich ins Wasser zu gehen. Die lokalen Strände nebenan werden den Gästen so verkauft als würden sie zum Hotel gehören, tun sie aber nicht. Liegen und Schirme müssen dort für 7-12€/Tag gemietet werden.Die „Entertainer“ im Hotel sprechen nur sehr schlechtes bzw. garkein englisch. Fast nur französisch.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Zimmer war ein besseres als erwartet. Das wasser beim „Strand“ war sehr sauber und man konnte wennn das Wetter es zugelassen hat, gut schwimmen gehen.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: -Staff spesso disinteressato/contrariato, inglese a malapena sufficiente per capirsi...-Animazione in francese: questo hotel sembrerebbe un hotel di un pacchetto fatto per i francesi e questo può dare fastidio agli altri ospiti (come noi) che non capiscono il francese. 10 frasi in francese e solo 1 in inglese.-L'hotel ha una sola "spiaggia" (DI CEMENTO!) inclusa, le altre due spiagge sono a PAGAMENTO.-All inclusive NON è All inclusive: ci sono solo pochi drink inclusi e, soprattutto al bar della spiaggia, ci sono solo birra/vino e soft drinks. Pessimo.-I drinks All-Inclusive erano spesso e volentieri fatti male.-Informazioni dell'hotel fuorvianti e poco chiare.-WiFi pessimo, è sparito svariate volte per più di 3 ore e il segnale andava e veniva, neanche sufficiente per caricare un video su youtube...-L'hotel ha un grande dislivello e spesso e volentieri si devono fare tante, tantissime scale...
reviewTextParts/Liked: +Mare stupendo, cristallino e leggermente mosso+Buona varietà di cibo e buona qualità in generale del cibo+Camera pulita+Rapporto qualità prezzo ottimo+Posizione e vista sono bellissimi e valgono la pena di essere visti.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Apartment door had zero soundproofing. We could hear every sound coming from the corridor which was especially annoying in the evenings for kids (corridors are very loud).Electronic door lock didn't work. We had one old-school key to share between 4 people. Hotel staff weren't able to help with that.Unlike advertised the indoor pool was not heated.Selection of drinks for all inclusive was very basic - enough to get you hammered if that's what you're after but nothing to enjoy.Small and rather neglected kids playground.Zero alternatives for in-hotel buffet dining.Very isolated - once you get there - you're stuck there if you don't have a car.No restaurants nearby.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Beautiful views. Recently renovated clean and bright apartment (2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms) with very spacious terrace.Good selection of fresh veggies for each meal.Well maintained green all over the hotel.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: When I made the reservation, I specifically asked if there was a heated pool, because we were coming in April and I didn't know what the weather is going to be like. The heated pool was broken during our entire stay ( 4 days) so we didn't enter the pool at all (it was cold for the regular pools), so it was very disappointing for us and our kid.Also I expected some sport activities, but there barely were any. I went to yoga and it was 20 minutes long...
reviewTextParts/Liked: The staff was very nice and the view was incredible.There was always food and drinks, even between meals.When we were disappointed about the pool they offered complimentary spa treatment

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The entertainment was terrible, it was completely in French with total disregard for any English guests (I also thought English was supposed to be the international language).  It was absolutley tacky and appalling with everything from the French version of 'Birdie Song' with everyone dancing like sheep around the pool, to the sad Comedy Night.  The ONLY good evening was the delightful and exceptional Greek Dancing evening, the only authentic piece of entertainment the whole time we stayed at the hotel.  If you dislike tacky pool dancing entertainment and are looking for something classier and more dignified, then avoid this hotel.
reviewTextParts/Liked: On initial appearances the hotel seemed to be all we were hoping for in terms of beautiful location, size of room, sea view room, different relaxation areas, pools and beach.  The food was also quite good.
reviewTitle: Total disregard for English guests with only French spoken as the main language.
roomInfo: Two-Bedroom Family Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Despite indicating well in advance it was our honeymoon and a written confirmation they’d provide wine & flowers on arrival, none of this sort. The room also looked like a downgrade compared to the pictures. We also kept finding long black hair all over the room (which we neither of us have). Food tends to get repetitive and the restaurant could be quite chaotic. Not a place you want to stay at if you have difficulties doing stairs, as you’re in for quite a hike to get anywhere.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Great location
roomInfo: Junior Suite with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Надо при бронировании внимательно выбирать номер. Очень много вариантов. Домики, номера в корпусе, со своим бассейном, много вариантов. Свой пирс лифт плюс ступени, не критично, но это нюанс который надо учесть. Пирс - сразу глубоко, могут быть волны. Спасателей нет нигде. Алкоголь включен и напитки, но очень простые. Элитный алкоголь лучше взять свой. Нет никаких шоу с приглашенными артистами. Просто дискотека небольшая, анниматоры развлекают и все. Явных минусов кроме выбора алкоголя не было. Но это совсем не критично, всегда можно купить.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Быстрое заселение. Оплату заранее не снимали. Оплата четко по сумме. Питание отличное. Много французов 🇫🇷😎. Пляжи: 2 общественных по краям и один собственный с пирса. Бассейны:2. Дали поздний чек аут бесплатно на 1,5 часа. Отличный номер с видом на море. Трансфер Букинга отличный, мерседес. От аэропорта мин 25-30. Персонал очень доброжелательный. Аниматоры постоянно работают и молодцы. Трехразовое питание, нет очередей, все максимально демократично. Никакого напряжения. Отель на мысе. Вода чистейшая. Есть экскурсии на лодке, платно. Вид с балкона на море из номера с видом на море на верхнем этаже потрясающий. Спасибо за предоставленный номер РЕСЕПШЕНУ!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Наш номер находился далековато от основного здания, приходилось использовать лифт и лестницы. Вместо заявленного вида на горы был вид на здания и прямо перед нашим балконом было дерево. Еда не всегда была вкусной
reviewTextParts/Liked:

Красивые интерьеры отеля, множество мест для отдыха, приветливый персонал, готовый помочь.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: A pesar de la calidad del entretenimiento nocturno, predominantemente en francés, podría mejorarse ofreciéndolo con mayor regularidad en inglés o alemán, dada la cantidad de huéspedes alemanes. Se observa una carencia de personal que hable alemán, lo que podría generar inconvenientes para aquellos que no hablan inglés. Se recomienda disponer de un vehículo, ya que el hotel está ubicado en una zona más apartada, especialmente si se planea explorar la región.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
La habitación era amplia, proporcionando gran comodidad. El personal del hotel era excepcionalmente servicial, amable y diligente, lo que en general contribuyó a una experiencia muy satisfactoria. La oferta gastronómica era deliciosa, con un variado buffet que incluía también opciones veganas. Destacó especialmente la increíble pizza casera servida a diario. La diversidad de piscinas, incluida una de agua salada, añadió un toque genial. La presencia de una playa privada, equipada con hamacas, sombrillas y un bar, ofreció un lujoso y cómodo plus, complementado por dos playas adicionales cercanas.
El hotel proporciona acceso Wifi en todas las áreas, incluso en la playa privada. Su diseño extenso y bien pensado permite disfrutar de vistas al mar en casi todas las esquinas, incluso durante el desayuno. Además, el hotel facilita el transporte en autobús desde Peninsula Hotel a Heraklion y viceversa, con una frecuencia de 2-4 horas y un costo de 3,50€.
reviewTitle: Experiencia de Lujo en un Hotel Completo: Vistas al Mar, Gastronomía Exquisita y Detalles Extra
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Los horarios de las comidas están adaptados para las costumbres de otros países, aunque no suposo ningún problema.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Das einzige was uns gestört hat war, dass sehr vieles auf Französisch ist. Wir hätten uns mehr englisch gewünscht.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
Der AUSBLICK! Egal wo man war, dieser Blick auf das gefühlt unendliche Meer ist atemberaubend.
Das Personal war immer hilfsbereit und sofort zur Stelle. Mein Mann hatte aufgrund eines Sonnenstichs die ganze Nacht erbrochen, ich fragte beim Mittag nach Zwieback und es wurde uns ohne Anstand gebracht, es wurde sogar noch eine typisch griechische Reissuppe für ihn gekocht, die dagegen helfen sollte. Da muss ich besonders Despoina erwähnen, sie hat sofort alles dafür gemacht und sich ein paar Tage später auch erkundigt ob wieder alles in Ordnung ist. Vielen Dank für alles!!!
Es gibt zu jeder Zeit etwas zu essen, auch wenn es nur Snacks sind. Die Getränke sind für All Inclusive überdurchschnittlich und auch das Essen ist gehobener Standard wenn wir es mit anderen All Inclusive Hotels vergleichen.
Wir haben auch ein viel größeres Zimmer bekommen als wir gebucht haben und da wir aufgrund eines verspäteten Check Ins erst später auf unser Zimmer konnten, haben wir am nächsten Abend ein kostenloses A la carte essen bekommen mit einem grandioses Ausblick.
Ich kann dieses Hotel nur wärmstens empfehlen.
reviewTitle: Überdurchschnittliches All Inclusive Hotel mit atemberaubem Ausblick!!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
unfortunately, I can't say it lived up to my expectations. The price I paid didn't match the overall performance of the hotel. One of the most disappointing aspects was the food. While the online pictures on booking and Google had us excited, the reality was quite different. The food quality, especially at breakfast, was poor.
Additionally, we were under the impression that the stay was all-inclusive, but we were surprised to find out that certain amenities, like wine at the a la carte restaurant, came with an extra charge. This inconsistency left us feeling somewhat frustrated.
For the price paid and the expectations set by the online images, our overall experience was less than satisfying. I hope these issues can be addressed in the future to provide a more enjoyable stay for guests.

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
- Entgegen jeder Erwartung mussten wir feststellen, dass das Hotel keinerlei Standard-Getränke der üblichen Anbieter zur Verfügung stellt wie Coca Cola, Fanta oder Sprite. Stattdessen gab es einen sirupartigen „Ersatz“ davon, der die Ankunft und die Zeit dort nicht unerheblich getrübt hat. Dies ist uns in all den Jahren noch nie untergekommen und war ein großes Manko. Entweder man nimmt Orange Carbonated oder mischt sich den normalen Orangensaft mit Mineralwasser, um auf einen fantaähnlichen Geschmack zu kommen.
- Auch bei den Aufstrichen muss man Kompromisse eingehen, auch wenn dies natürlich sehr subjektiv zu bewerten ist:
Die Schokoladencreme war mit etwas wie Nutella keinesfalls zu vergleichen und auch die Marmelade hat eher enttäuscht.
- Zudem gab es zwar Spiegelei, aber nicht direkt Rührei, sondern eine Art zerkleinertes Omelette, was aber geschmacklich nur befriedigend war und nicht wie erhofft hervorragend.
- Die vorgenannten Punkte haben insbesondere das Frühstück nicht zur Lieblingsmahlzeit werden lassen, auch wenn man doch immer etwas gefunden hat und gestärkt in den Tag starten konnte.
- Wenngleich die Aussicht einfach fantastisch ist, ist das Resort doch sehr abgelegen und es gibt kaum Möglichkeiten, fußläufig mal „rauszukommen“ und die Umgebung zu erkunden. Auch fehlt gänzlich die Option eines (romantischen) Spaziergangs an der Promenade. Man ist auf ein Auto angewiesen, will man mehr von Griechenland sehen.
- Das Areal ist sehr weitläufig und nicht ideal ausgeschildert, sodass es anfangs durchaus mal vorkommen kann, dass man sich auf dem Weg zum hotelfremden Sandstrand oder der hoteleigenen Tsimento Beach Bar verläuft und ein bisschen länger braucht.
- Das WLAN auf dem Zimmer war sehr schwach ausgeprägt und nahezu nicht nutzbar.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
- die Aussicht war grandios, das Meer bildschön
- das Animationsteam und deren Programm:
am Tag: zahlreiche sportliche Aktivitäten wie Volleyball, Fußball, Boule/Bolcha/Boccia, Wasserpolo/Wasserball, Darts und andere
am Abend: sehr unterhaltsame Quiz-Nights, bei denen es zum Beispiel darum ging, anhand von Soundtracks die Filme zuzuordnen oder auch Tanzshows (East & West Show) - da ist für jeden etwas dabei :)
- das Spa mit Efi und Sula laden einfach zur Entspannung ein
- die Quad-Safari sowie das beste Sandwich aus Gyros mit Pitabrot in Fodele ;)
reviewTitle: Es war ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt in Griechenland in einem sehr schönen Hotel, den man trotz einiger Abstriche auch wir

reviewTextParts/Disliked:

Très excentré donc obligation de louer une voiture pour aller dans les lieux attractifs de l'île. Service de bus très compliqué voir inexistant obligé de prendre un taxi pour l'aéroport (~50€/trajet).

La vue mer incroyable de tout point de l'hôtel.
Les piscines spacieuses avec de nombreux transats ainsi que l'accès faciles aux plages.

Le buffet varié et copieux.
Les activités proposées à proximité telles que le quad, location de voitures, criques..

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Ho trovato scomodo il fatto che durante i pasti, ogni volta che avevamo sete, ci dovevamo alzare per andare a prendere l'acqua al buffet. Sarebbe più pratico e più comodo avere una bottiglia d'acqua per ogni tavolo, invece che doversi alzare continuamente, facendo avanti e indietro. Animazione scarsa e poco coinvolgente.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Hotel curato, pulito e molto grande. Personale gentile e disponibile. Noi avevamo la mezza pensione. Colazione e cena molto buone, il buffet era abbondante e con una grande varietà di cibo e di proposte. Tantissimi dolci squisiti e pancake caldi fatti al momento. Molto buona anche la pizza, complimenti al pizzaiolo. Il mare è favoloso. Location stupenda con una vista spettacolare.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Pas assez de protéines simples. Nous aurions aimé avoir tous les jours une grillade simple et diététique. Il y avait souvent du porc et les plats chauds étaient plutôt en sauce. Du thon en conserve ou des œufs durs au buffet des hors d'œuvre auraient été une solution.Les animations étaient moyennes, à part : la soirée live et la soirée crétoise qui a remporté un vif succès, même si elle ne correspondait pas à notre goût.Attention, il y a beaucoup de marches dans cet hôtel...

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Smjestaj generalno ne ostavlja dojam hotela s 4 zvjezdice. Soba je minimalno uredjena i pomalo otrcana. Moglo bi joj koristiti preuredjenje. Dašak lukauza koji se ocekuje u hotelu s 4 zvjezdice ovdje potpuno izostaje.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Lokacija objekta je predivna, plaze su lijepe i uredne, priroda oduzima dah. Hrana tijekom dorucka i vecere je raznolika iako su pojedinacna jela ponekad bezokusna ili preslana. Kokteli su jako fini. Nekoliko koktela dobrodoslice je ukljuceno u cijenu smjestaja. Dodatni plus su bazeni od kojih je jedan s morskom vodom i neki dodatni sadrzaji, npr biljar.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Jeder Weg zwischen Pools,  Restaurant, Snackbar, Lobby oder Zimmer ist sehr weit, dafür gibt's zu wenig Toiletten auf diesem weitläufigen Gelände. Keine Duschen besonders am weit abgelegenen Salzwasserpool. Der Kinderpool mit  Rutschen ist zu weit abgelegen, schon fast nicht mehr auf dem Gelände. Es gibt nur eine Snackbar mit allen Getränken und Snacks am Hauptgebäude. Zum Ortskern und der schönen Strandpromenade von Agia Pelagia ist es zu Fuß sehr weit, man kann für 10€ per Taxi hin fahren (hin und zurück 20€). Die Abendunterhaltung war nicht besonders unterhaltsam.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Die Juniorsuite war sehr sauber und geräumig auch bei Dreierbelegung mit einem super Blick aufs Meer und die Insel Dia. Jeden Abend gibt es zusätzlich zum Buffet frisch gebackene Pizza und abwechselnde regionale Spezialitäten. Personal ist sehr nett. Ein Bus fährt mehrmals täglich direkt vom Hotel nach Heraklion (Tickets gegen Gebühr). Es gibt 2 öffentliche Kiesstrände mit Strandbars, Tavernen und kleinen Einkaufsläden sehr nah am Hotel (Liegen gegen Gebühr)

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Wir waren mit zwei kleinen Kindern unterwegs und hatten entsprechend Kinderwagen dabei. Das Hotel ist an in einen Hang gebaut, was natürlich eine super Lage ist, aber auch viele Treppen bedeutet. Somit hatten wir leider nicht die Möglichkeit mit den Kindern überall bequem hinzukommen. Dazu kommt dass die Strände nur sehr klein sind und auch nicht Kinder geeignet. Kurz um: das Hotel ist super für Singles oder auch Paare ohne kleine Kinder, aber in unseren Augen nicht für Familien geeignet, zumindest nicht für Familien mit Kindern unter 3 Jahren (u.a. Musik am Hauptpool, lange Wege mit Treppen, laute Animation am Abend).
reviewTextParts/Liked: Die Lage ist super, wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Meerblick, das war wunderschön. Das Buffet ist üppig, Personal sehr freundlich und serviceorientiert. Da wir Probleme hatten mit der Familientauglichkeit, wurde uns sehr schnell und unkompliziert geholfen und auch immer wieder Hilfe angeboten. Das fanden wir sehr gut. Für Singles oder auch Paare ohne kleine Kinder ist dieses Hotel sicherlich eine sehr gute Wahl.
reviewTitle: Tolle Lage, sehr guter Service, leider nicht optimal für Familien mit kleinen Kindern.
roomInfo: Junior Suite with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Liked: Superbe hotel, le staff est très attentif et généreux, belle vue a tous les angles et piscines a volonté! Facile de louer une voiture et explorer les alentours, ou de rester dans le coin sur la plage et mer turquoise, le rêve!
reviewTitle: Top hotel, le staff est très accueillant et les vues superbes!
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Le lit collé contre le mur et aménagé sur une plateforme en béton mais il reste confortable malgré tout.Il manquait une tablette pour poser la trousse de toilette et un porte-manteau dans la salle de bains.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Nous sommes revenus dans cet établissement après notre magnifique séjour l'été dernier.Le site est exceptionnel. La plage aménagée est proche avec plusieurs chaises longues et parasols à disposition sans oublier les serviettes de plage prévues dans les chambres. La piscine est grande et située juste à côté des deux bars.La nourriture est très variée et les plats sont savoureux à tous les repas.Le personnel à la réception est professionnel, très agréable et réactif à nos demandes. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'efficacité de Maria-Christina dans sa gestion de notre requête de remboursement. Nous avons également apprécié la réservation du transfert en taxi depuis et vers l'aéroport.
roomInfo: Junior Suite with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Не хватало ярких пятен на белых стенах : в номере, ресторане и пр. Видно, что обновили все после локдауна. А картины не повесили ещё.. У меня в белом номере был гвоздик, а картины было. Но это совсем не мешало наслаждаться видом на море!
reviewTextParts/Liked: Все понравилось,  даже поменяли номер на побольше, чтоб нам с дочкой-подростком было комфортно !
roomInfo: Junior Suite with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Liked: Die Barkeeper waren sehr kompetent und erkannten früh, dass es cleverer ist uns grosse Biergläser statt Becher zu geben, Grüsse gehen raus an Manos
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Столовая выглядит устаревшей, как мебель так и посуда. От приборов сильно пахнет металлом, иногда он даже чувствуется при приеме пищи.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
Необычно просторный и большой номер для стандартного номера, сумасшедший вид на море сквозь стеклянный балкон. Хорошая еда, большой выбор.
Есть теннисный и волейбольный корт.

reviewTextParts/Liked: Personal in jeglicher Hinsicht vorbildlich
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: У нас номер был зарезервирован на троих взрослых, а халатов и тапочек было положено на двоих. Однажды полотенец при замене тоже положили на двоих, но это мелочи, на которые можно не обратить внимания. Из неудобств можно отметить, что в ванной комнате нашего номера унитаз установлен достаточно высоко и для людей с небольшим ростом это будет неудобно. Слабенький вай фай, но если без фанатизма, то этого достаточно выйти в социальные сети.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Приветливый и внимательный персонал, все наши вопросы всегда решались. В последний день пребывания  отключился кондиционер, позвонили на ресепшн и через некоторое время проблема была устранена. Очень хорошая территория отеля, можно бесконечно долго гулять (на территории много котиков), понравился нижний бассейн с морской водой это идеальное место после целого дня поездок по острову, народа в нем практически никогда не было, но тут все таки осень сказывается. Уборка номера ежедневно. Удобная кровать, по две подушки на каждого разной жесткости. Может нам повезло с соседями, но было тихо и мы хорошо высыпались. Что касается еды устраивало все, объедались каждый день, все свежее, без излишеств, но ассортимент вполне хороший, предлагались блюда из разных кухонь. Был вечер критской кухни с улитками и другими морепродуктами. Вкусные панкейки и сладкий апельсиновый фреш. Отдельно хочу сказать про вид из номера, у нас он был чудесный, каждый день мы встречали солнце - это незабываемо красиво. О транспортном сообщении. Лучше, конечно, брать в аренду авто и колесить по острову свободно. При отеле есть небольшая  территория для парковки, мы первые дни приезжали поздно, но всегда находили место. Без машины из отеля можно добраться на автобусе до Ираклиона (автобус останавливается напротив ресепшн). Но очень мало рейсов. Последний автобус стартует из Ираклиона в 17.30 а так хотелось бы погулять по вечернему Ираклиону! Альтернатива такси, но дорого, сорок евро. Рядом с отелем есть еще два пляжа, нужно всего лишь спуститься вниз. Нам по душе пришелся Psaromoura beach, он меньше, но уютнее. Шезлонги и зонтики на нем платные, мелкая галька, заход в воду плавный, вода нереально красивая, берите маску и ласты для сноркелинга.Анимация как все пишут и правда только на французском, но при отличном настроении язык юмора звучит одинаково на всех языках.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Obsluha u baru k all inclusive - kromě středy 28/9 ( jiná slečna) působila jakoby ji hosté obtěžovali.Wifi slabá od čtvrtka se nešlo vůbec připojit.Jako další podnět bychom rády navrhly více poli v koupelně.Animační programy - především cvičení bylo také slabší a nebylo podle rozpisu. Buď mělo být v programu upraveno nebo se alespoň mělo přiblížit popisu - muscle building byl stejný jako stretching a joga.Horní bazén byl už od 4 hodin celý ve stínu, stejně tak bazény u pokojů s pool sharing. Pokud bychom si objednaly tento pokoj byly bychom velmi zklamané, protože odpolední slunce tam už vůbec nesvítilo.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Výborná čistota, výborné jídlo, hygienická opatření dodržována personálem, perfektní lokalita, vše dle objednání - prostě žádný problém. Komunikace s recepcí perfektní.Pokojské vždy zdravily, personál v jídelně milý, ale skoro nezdravili, Obsluha u baru k all inclusive - středa 28/9 velmi milá, ostatní dny jiná slečna působila jakoby ji hosté obtěžovali.Bazény byly velké a čisté, prostředí kolem bazénů se denně uklízelo a umývalo.Velmi vysoká úroveň jídla, pestrost, každý den něco jiného, velký výběr všech pokrmů od salátů, masa, příloh po dezerty a ovoce. každodenní grilování včetně dekorací - vykrajované melouny např. prostě úžasné. Posíláme poděkování týmu v kuchyni.

reviewTextParts/Liked: Die Anlage ist wirklich traumhaft und sehr gepflegt und sauber. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend – schon bei der späten Ankunft war Essen zurückgehalten worden und rundum die Uhr wurde bei Fragen und Anliegen direkt unterstützt. Vielen Dank!

reviewTextParts/Liked: I liked everything. This was really a 4* resort, built on the rock and in the rock. Beautiful scenery, The food was good, great selection. Everything clean from the room to the pool and beach areas. You have to walk quite a bit, it is large there. The room was modern, light, well maintained. The balcony had beautiful sea view. Nice garden all around. If you travel by car, the road there is a bit narrow. Everyone there was nice and helpful. I especially appricated that they have let me stay in the room a bit longer during my check out when there was a bad thunderstorm outside.

reviewTextParts/Liked: Good location and facilities. Good food and drinks. A little bit salty,  for myself, but overall it was an excellent experience.

reviewTextParts/Liked: My family and I really had a memorable stay in Peninsula Resort. The location of the property is absolutely amazing, built on top of the cliffs with 360 sea views and very close to 2 small rocky beaches. We arrived in a very early flight and the Night Manager quickly accommodated my family in a temporary room so we could have a sleep before checking in an upgraded family room with amazing sea views. The staff Maria, Antonio and everyone was amazing and treated us as VIPs going beyond to make us happy. The food service is really good with a wide variety of local and international specialities. All the installations are very well maintained and cleaned except for the children playground and mini club that need an update and the children pool needs more hammocks too please. The entertainment was really good as well and we have a great stay. We will definitely go back in the future and recommend it to everyone that is choosing a resort in this area of Crete.
reviewTitle: A memorable stay in The Peninsula Resort
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: The beach looked nice but not nice to go to plus you need to pay extra. The location is not that great, in order to see things you have to for a long drive.
reviewTextParts/Liked: We had a family room which was perfect from size and connecting door amazing! The view is absolutely breathtaking. Only minus is the beach as it is pure stones and without shoes you can't go. Hotel itself and staff was amazing! Food was wonderful always a fresh grill on the outside and food wherever you looked.

- Jegliche Programme wurden ALLE auf Französisch geführt und es wurden nur französisch sprechende Personen angefragt „mitzuspielen“.
- Man fühlte sich nicht als ob man in Griechenland die Ferien verbringt, sondern irgendwo in Nizza in Frankreich. Alles war nur auf Französisch.
- Unterhaltungsprogramme ansonsten auch nicht interessant, bis auf einen Abend als man Sirtaki vorgeführt hatte.
- Alkoholische Getränke die im All-Inclusive sind, sind leider nicht die besten Getränke.
- Wlan funktioniert auf den Zimmern sehr schlecht
- Wir hatten ein Taxi um 11:00 Uhr für um 18:00 Uhr bestellt (Flughafentransfer), jedoch kam das Taxi um 18:40 Uhr und das Personal war sehr Respektlos und sagten mir alle 5 Minuten „das Taxi kommt, relax“ - schlussendlich war die Situation für uns am Flughafen wahnsinnig stressig. Kein Entgegenkommen oder Verständnis seitens Personal
reviewTextParts/Liked:
Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Meerblick gebucht. Der Ausblick war sehr schön und unschlagbar. Auch die Aussicht vom Resort und Bar war sehr schön.
Das Essen war frisch, lecker und abwechslungsreich - da lohnt es sich das All-Inclusive zu buchen. Beach vom Hotel inkl. Bar sehr schön, mit gratis Liegen. Musik am Pool war angenehm.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: L'hôtel ne correspondait pas au prestations vendus. Salle à manger sale au sol . Il n'y a pas de All In. Pour le goûté des biscuit sec sont servi dans des sachets. La petite  bouteille d'eau est payante . Cet hôtel n'est pas un 4* mais plutôt un 3 étoiles. L'hôtel est triste
reviewTextParts/Liked: Très bon emplacement, avec vue superbe .
reviewTitle: Hôtel qui correspond à un 3 étoiles
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: - les services en général - réservation pour aller jouer au tennis, mais les 2 raquettes prêtées sont cassés et les balles inutilisables - malgré le all inclusive, tout n’est pas gratuit (pas tous les cocktails de dispo, service seulement jusqu’à 23h après payant) - buffet repas très limité et pas toujours qualitatif - animations limitées (présentes mais toujours les mêmes) - manque de communication (l’hôtel nous réserve un taxi mais ne nous dit pas qu’il faut payer en espèces)
reviewTextParts/Liked: - les infrastructures (hôtel entouré de la mer avec vue magnifique, repas avec vue sur la mer, 2 grandes piscines, 3 plages, chambres bien aménagées) - animations
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Η απόσταση από την θάλασσα στο μπάρ και στις τουαλέτες.  Ανεβαίνεις βουνό με πολλές σκάλες. Το beach bar  σερβίρει συγκεκριμένα ποτά για το all inclusive , έτσι πρέπει να  πηγαίνεις στο κεντρικό Bar, το οποίο βρίσκεται στην κορυφή αν θέλεις  να πιείς ένα ποτό ή ένα καφέ.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Το δωμάτιο μεγάλο , άνετο με πολύ ωραία θέα και μεγάλο μπάνιο.  Επίσης η θάλασσα πολύ ωραία, αρκεί να ξέρεις να κολυμπάς, γιατί δεν υπάρχει παραλία, πέφτεις αμέσως στα βαθιά.
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Café payant 2,50€, jus d'orange pressé 2€, buffet répétitif à l'image d'une cantine.
Les fruits sans goût. Ne vous fiez pas à leur Instagram.
Très peu de choix d'alcool alors que nous étions en all inclusive, alcool de bas de gamme...
Juste la localisation de cet hôtel est magnifique.
Par contre, prévoir une voiture pour apprécier la nourriture grecque et visiter la Crète.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Panorama
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

propertyResponse:
We are very sorry to hear about your experience. However, we kindly ask you to please remove your comment regarding the accusation of theft as there is absolutely no proof.
Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre votre expérience. Cependant, nous vous demandons de supprimer votre commentaire concernant l'accusation que vous portez car il n'y a absolument aucune preuve.
reviewTextParts/Disliked:
Que dire de cet hôtel ... A FUIR!
- Personnel à la limite du manque de respect, nous avons été volée d’un collier avec kara bleu alors qu’il était posé sur notre table de nuit, le lendemain matin après que la chambre est été nettoyée, PLUS RIEN.
Après 48h l’hôtel revient vers nous et nous propose UN SPA en guise de « relaxation »
- Buffet à la limite du 3 étoiles, les fruits était toujours les mêmes : pastèque et melon jaune.
Pas de très grande qualité et non variés
- Dans la description de l’hôtel il était noté qu’il y avait plusieurs snacks et bars d’ouvert, en effet il y avait absolument RIEN pour manger entre les repas, tout de même très désagréable surtout quand on a pris le ALL INCLUSIVE.
- Dans cet hôtel, en all inclusive, le café est à 2,50€ et la bouteille d’eau 1€ , sans compter des « véritables choses «  qui était inclus dans la formule... vraiment désastreux.
- Piscine à l’eau extrêmement salée je pense que c’est de l’eau de mer mais personnellement je n’ai pas aimé surtout quand on voit comment elle est entretenue.
- Pour finir, cet hôtel nous a clairement gâché notre séjour, heureusement que nous avions loué des voitures pour manger à l’extérieur et profiter réellement des paysages et de la bonne nourriture que peu offrir la Crète.
reviewTextParts/Liked: La vue

reviewTextParts/Disliked: We stayed in room 625 which was right underneath the AC units and they were making loud banging noise every 5 minutes. There was never a quiet moment in the room, as you can hear every possible noise and made it impossible to sleep.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: too many stairs although there is an elevator. Our air condition was not working. it took two days to fix it.

reviewTextParts/Disliked: I think they need to put some air conditioning (or fans at least) in the dining area. Its spacious and provides ample seating but it does get a little warm. The trick is to get a table by the sliding doors and open them wide to catch the breeze! You also have to deal with the inevitable pool chair hoarders...throwing towels on chairs early in the morning and not returning until mid morning. It's manageable, but staff could keep a better eye on the practice. With the room housekeeping, it would be nice to have fresh water replaced daily in the fridge. The same applies to the tea and instant coffee ( saying that a simple note to housekeeping and they provided more of everything). Saying that we are starting to see more Nespresso machines, and this would have been a great addition to finish the room.
reviewTextParts/Liked: The resort was great. Our room had a spectacular view to the sea. It was a spacious 2 bedroom apartment with a brilliant shower and balcony. It was an all inclusive package providing breakfast, lunch and dinner, with snacks and drinks throughout the day. The food was very good, with specialty dishes changing each day. Pools were spacious and clean, and you also had direct access to the sea from the lower pool area.
reviewTitle: A lovely resort, providing a relaxing and enjoyable stay
roomInfo: Superior Double Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
The WiFi at the hotel area is very wick and slow, that was inconvenient.
The alcohol provided within the all inclusive program is not tasty, and iv'e felt I needed to pay extra every time I wanted to enjoy a good cocktail or beer, beside that the food and drink are in good quality.
The shampoo provided in the rooms was low quality and without smell, that pushed us to buy our own shampoo.
reviewTextParts/Liked:
The views from the hotel are absolutely stunning, the sea is everywhere you look with the hills and villages around, the stuff is helpful and lovely, the food is good and diverse with alot of different options and fresh vegetables and olive oil every meal, there is also fresh pasta and pizza hand made in lunch and dinner. Under the hotel there is a beautiful separate beach where you can enjoy the sea or even dive with a good company at the place.
The hotel have a private concrete beach where you can swim and snorkel or enjoy a cocktail or beer (not included in the all inclusive program).
The hotel offer spa services, car rental and taxi services (extra charge).
reviewTitle: Very nice all inclusive resort with stunning views
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: Rien de négatif, que du positif ! Tout est à disposition pour que vous passiez un excellent séjour à Peninsula Resort & Spa, et s'il vous manque quelque chose, n'hésitez pas à demander à la réception ou à Jennifer, elles feront en sorte de répondre à vos demandes
reviewTextParts/Liked: Le complexe hôtelier est top en tout point de vue : chambre (confort, propreté), le personnel (des femmes de ménage aux personnes de la réception, des bars, du restaurant, sans oublier Jennifer qui a été pour nous une aide précieuse pour nos vols de retour), les vues, les différents endroits de l'hôtel (bars, piscines, plage privée, restaurant, terrasses, chambres, ...), les excursions proposées (nous avons réalisé la sortie en Quad avec Stan, qui est une sortie à faire absolument !). Je vous recommande les cocktails, plus particulièrement les Mojito de Pavlos ! J'ai testé aussi le Spa, n'hésitez pas à y aller, les massages sont réalisés avec des produits locaux. Tout simplement, nous avons passé 10 jours exceptionnels dans un hôtel superbe ! Nous recommandons à 1 000% !
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Sea View

reviewTextParts/Liked: A wonderful October visit. We loved the festive atmosphere of the closing weekend! A perfect end-of-season experience. My friends and I were all offered upgrades to Junior Suites with breathtaking sea views. Despite the cloudy weather, we managed to enjoy the spa, relax and unwind. A special thank you to Georgia at the front desk for her helpful tips and laughs! Will be back again soon!

reviewTextParts/Disliked:
There was absolutely nothing I did not
Like. Seriously.
reviewTextParts/Liked: Omg. This was the most GORGEOUS hotel ever. I spent soooo long researching the right vacation spot and I am so glad I stumbled upon Peninsula Resort and Spa. My fiancé loved it as well. We looked at the ocean and walked on the rocks and relaxed in our room and took in the breathtaking scenery. It was seriously what I needed. Looking through my calendar for a time to come back. Thank you so much your staff was BEYOND friendly and helpful and I would give twelve stars if I could.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: That I could not stay longer!
reviewTextParts/Liked: I’ve been coming to the peninsula since it was a small traditional island hotel. It brings me great joy to see that it has evolved into a world class destination. Yet it has not lost its charm nor Cretan hospitality. The staff is like family they remember you from year to year and make you feel very special. The food is amazing and always available whether you’re in the main dining or the new à la carte restaurant or at the beach bar it’s always fresh, delicious, beautifully presented, And a variety to please all pallets.
roomInfo: Double or Twin Room with Mountain View

reviewTextParts/Disliked: I can’t find fault with anything
reviewTextParts/Liked:
the hotel is spacious - although there are a lot of rooms (and also room types which is great), it never felt crowded, and there were lots of different areas to hang out in.
The food was excellent - wide range at every meal, and two themed nights at dinner during the week with a focus on Cretan specialties, and fish and seafood, which were both amazing.
The hotel staff were without exception welcoming and went out of their way to make our stay as good as possible - from our housekeeper who went out of her way to accommodate my sleepy teenage girls in her daily routine, the reception team who arranged airport taxis for us and helped check covid testing arrangements locally, to Jennifer the Customer Relations lead who was omnipresent for a chat and to answer questions and seemingly fluent in every language she encountered.
reviewTitle: A great end of season stay

reviewTextParts/Liked: The location is great. The views are breathtaking and even though there are many people, there’s enough space for everyone. You could either take a taxi , which could be arranged by the hotel, to go to the hotel or drive. It’s about 40 minutes by car. For us, the highlight was the amazing staff . They’re are genuinely helpful and friendly. The beds are also very comfortable. There are not many hotels which offer extra large beds, which could be a deciding factor as good sleep is a priority for us. The buffet also offers plenty of options even for vegetarians. We visited in May which is great, just before the high season starts and we really enjoyed our stay.
reviewTitle: We had a great stay here and would like to go back.
